word_mean: 在北(南)半球呈顺(反)时针方向旋转的大气涡旋。在气压场上表现为高气压。

sentence.Network_en: The anticyclone weather situations are more favorable than the cyclonic ones.
sentence.Network_cn: 反气旋天气情况比气旋天气情况更有利些.

sentence.Network_en: A center of high atmospheric pressure ; an anticyclone.
sentence.Network_cn: 只有一个中心点的圆拱.

sentence.Network_en: As interactions with JANGMI steering flow from the anticyclone in southern China and moves WNW.
sentence.Network_cn: 随著另一热带气旋蔷薇移离,米克拉受到华南的一个弱高压脊影响而向西北偏西移动.

entry.def: An anticyclone is an area of high atmospheric pressure which causes settled weather conditions and, in summer, clear skies and high temperatures.

means.word_mean: 1. (meteorology) winds spiraling outward from a high-pressure center; circling clockwise in the northern hemisphere and counter-clockwise in the southern
